mdRecord.dcterms:description: Informal invitation to get in touch with author, with response. Invitation to draw cats if you like cats, with appropriate responses, and one response with a more sexual bent. [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]
